column7: See Channeler Avalloc for passage to Mag Well
column8: Speak with Elder Krenyn in Mag Mell

column4: Speak with Channeler avaloc in lower Fintain for passage to Mag Mell where Elder Krenyn resides.
column7: Channeler Avalloc says, "Greetings, <Class>. Do you wish to leave Lamfhota's Sound? It is within my power to send you to Mag Mell if you would like. Just tell me when you are ready and I will send you on your way!"

column4: Thave been expecting you, <Player>. Welcome to Mag Mell.

The town of Fintain and it's stronghold of Dun Cormyra are deeply in your debt, Celt. The experience and abilities which you have gained here are sorely needed in other areas in Hibernia, particularly where the realm war is raging.

There is more training you must experience before you master the <Class> profession, but there is no question that you are well on your way.

The many peoples of Hibernia are here to help you, <Player> and there are many adventures that lay ahead.I send you to the capable care of Elder Krenyn, in Hibernia's glorious town of Mag Mell. Channeler Avalloc in lower Fintain will provide you with passage.

Thank you, <Player>. You will not be forgotten.
